before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"aufh1","text":"Prepare Ethanol 70% from absolute Ethanol : Mix 35 mL of absolute Ethanol with 15 mL nuclease-free water in a Falcon 50mL Store at -20°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9e1um","text":"Radiolaria are protists which can't be cultivated. These microoganisms have to be isolated by single-cell for genetic identification and it can be difficult to get clean DNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9j5lk","text":"Here we optimized a DNA extraction protocol from protist single-cell.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5qi4t","text":"It works very well on single-cell Radiolaria, Foraminifers, but also Ciliates, Dinoflagelletes, Diatoms.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Ecology of Marine Plankton (ECOMAP) team - Roscoff
Protist Research to Optimize Tools in Genetics (PROT-G)

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"7am22","text":"Material and Equipment :","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fov8b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2suvh","text":"-  Glass bent micropipettes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5gtc9","text":"-  Silicone Tubing  (Cole-Parmer, Tube silicone platinium LS T17  ref. FV-96410-17","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":11}],"data":[]},{"key":"dbhns","text":"-  StereoMicroscope or binocular microscope.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c9kdf","text":"-  Petridishes Diameter 70mm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"coi79","text":"-  Centrifuge 5417R (Eppendorf)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d45cr","text":"-  Thermomixer Eppendorf","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2u5n2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"alu68","text":"Kit, Reagents and Chemicals :","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1na63","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"770rh","text":"- MasterPure Complete DNA and RNA purification kit (Epicenter Illumina, ref MC85200)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":2,"length":49}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bnop1","text":"Enzymes (Proteinase K, RNase, DNase) are stored at -20°C","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cqh1s","text":"Other reagents from the kit are stored at room temperature.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fbrvm","text":"- Ethanol absolute, molecular biogy quality. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4m7s4","text":"- Propan-2-ol quality molecular biology.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5p8hh","text":"- 0,22µm filtered Seawater or artificial Seawater.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7jbmh","text":"- Ice for enzyme storage during labwork.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cafgf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"778B7ACB6F8611EAAAAB0242AC110003","url":"https://www.coleparmer.fr/i/masterflex-l-s-high-performance-precision-pump-tubing-platinum-cured-silicone-l-s-15-25-ft/9641015"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2t7a","text":"Isolate individually protist cells (at least 50µm in length) using a glass bent micropipette under a binocular microscope. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b4u6k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f1bok","text":"Wash each cell in three successive baths of 0.22µm-filtered and sterile seawater. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ph76","text":"Add 30 μL of lysis buffer (Tissue and Cell Lysis Solution from MasterPureTM DNA and RNA Purification Kit, Epicenter) and store at -20°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f0643","text":"Pellet cells by centrifugation (2 min at Vmax), throw the supernatant, let ~25-30 µL of liquid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3oma4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ipni","text":"Dilute 1 µL of Proteinase K in 300 µL de lysis solution Tissue et Cellule for each sample. Vortex 10 sec for resuspending cells (facultative).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"crg10","text":"Add 300 µL of mix Proteinase K + lysis solution Tissue et Cellule in each sample. Vortex.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2o7ea","text":"Incubate 15 min at 65°C , 1000 rpm. Put samples in ice 3-5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"csjdc","text":"Add 150 µL MPC reagent to 300 µL of lysed sample. Vortex.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ov0v","text":"Spin 10 min at 11 000 g, 4°C. If there is no pellet, add more 25 µL MPC buffer and spin again 10 min at 11 000 g, 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"29sss","text":"Transfer the supernatant ion a new clean microtube (1,5 mL), discard the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e470h","text":"(To keep the squeletton, keep the tube with the pellet, add 500 µL MilliQ Water and store at -20°C).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":100}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8qqca","text":"Add 500 µL of Isopropanol. Mix per inversion. Spin 10min at Vmax, 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5f3ng","text":"Discard the supernatant with precaution, without touching the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"59jri","text":"Add 500 µL of Ethanol 70%. Don’t vortex, mix gently the support. Spin 5min at Vmax ;at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":27,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"djb9f","text":"Discard a maximum of supernatant with precaution, without touching the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7va74","text":"Let dry 5-10 min at room temperature. The pellet should become transparent.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6po30","text":"Elute in 25 µL of TE1x buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9dr8q","text":"Vortex and spin shortly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7s5er","text":"Store at - 80°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"dalau","text":"Wear labcoat, gloves.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8qcso","text":"Decontaminate all the surface area, and equipments (rotor, racks, pipettes...) with Ethanol 70% and DNA away.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"beekj","text":"Works with filter tips.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
